an4.184:1.1: Atha kho janussoni brahmano yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
an4.184:1.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho janussoni brahmano bhagavantam etadavoca:
an4.184:2.2: ‘natthi yo maranadhammo samano na bhayati, na santasam apajjati maranassa’”ti.
an4.184:2.3: “Atthi, brahmana, maranadhammo samano bhayati, santasam apajjati maranassa;
an4.184:2.4: atthi pana, brahmana, maranadhammo samano na bhayati, na santasam apajjati maranassa.
an4.184:3.1: Katamo ca, brahmana, maranadhammo samano bhayati, santasam apajjati maranassa?
an4.184:3.2: Idha, brahmana, ekacco kamesu avitarago hoti avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipaso avigataparilaho avigatatanho.
an4.184:3.4: Tassa annatarena galhena rogatankena phutthassa evam hoti:
an4.184:3.5: ‘piya vata mam kama jahissanti, piye caham kame jahissami’ti.
an4.184:3.6: So socati kilamati paridevati, urattalim kandati, sammoham apajjati.
an4.184:3.7: Ayam kho, brahmana, maranadhammo samano bhayati, santasam apajjati maranassa.
an4.184:4.1: Puna caparam, brahmana, idhekacco kaye avitarago hoti avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipaso avigataparilaho avigatatanho.
an4.184:4.3: Tassa annatarena galhena rogatankena phutthassa evam hoti:
an4.184:4.4: ‘piyo vata mam kayo jahissati, piyancaham kayam jahissami’ti.
an4.184:4.5: So socati kilamati paridevati, urattalim kandati, sammoham apajjati.
an4.184:4.6: Ayampi kho, brahmana, maranadhammo samano bhayati, santasam apajjati maranassa.
an4.184:5.1: Puna caparam, brahmana, idhekacco akatakalyano hoti akatakusalo akatabhiruttano katapapo kataluddo katakibbiso.
an4.184:5.3: Tassa annatarena galhena rogatankena phutthassa evam hoti:
an4.184:5.4: ‘akatam vata me kalyanam, akatam kusalam, akatam bhiruttanam;
an4.184:5.5: katam papam, katam luddam, katam kibbisam.
an4.184:5.6: Yavata, bho, akatakalyananam akatakusalanam akatabhiruttananam katapapanam kataluddanam katakibbisanam gati tam gatim pecca gacchami’ti.
an4.184:5.7: So socati kilamati paridevati, urattalim kandati, sammoham apajjati.
an4.184:5.8: Ayampi kho, brahmana, maranadhammo samano bhayati, santasam apajjati maranassa.
an4.184:6.1: Puna caparam, brahmana, idhekacco kankhi hoti vicikicchi anitthangato saddhamme.
an4.184:6.3: Tassa annatarena galhena rogatankena phutthassa evam hoti:
an4.184:6.5: So socati kilamati paridevati, urattalim kandati, sammoham apajjati.
an4.184:6.6: Ayampi kho, brahmana, maranadhammo samano bhayati, santasam apajjati maranassa.
an4.184:6.7: Ime kho, brahmana, cattaro maranadhamma samana bhayanti, santasam apajjanti maranassa.
an4.184:7.1: Katamo ca, brahmana, maranadhammo samano na bhayati, na santasam apajjati maranassa?
an4.184:7.2: Idha, brahmana, ekacco kamesu vitarago hoti vigatacchando vigatapemo vigatapipaso vigataparilaho vigatatanho.
an4.184:7.4: Tassa annatarena galhena rogatankena phutthassa na evam hoti:
an4.184:7.5: ‘piya vata mam kama jahissanti, piye caham kame jahissami’ti.
an4.184:7.6: So na socati na kilamati na paridevati, na urattalim kandati, na sammoham apajjati.
an4.184:7.7: Ayam kho, brahmana, maranadhammo samano na bhayati, na santasam apajjati maranassa.
an4.184:8.1: Puna caparam, brahmana, idhekacco kaye vitarago hoti vigatacchando vigatapemo vigatapipaso vigataparilaho vigatatanho.
an4.184:8.3: Tassa annatarena galhena rogatankena phutthassa na evam hoti:
an4.184:8.4: ‘piyo vata mam kayo jahissati, piyancaham kayam jahissami’ti.
an4.184:8.5: So na socati na kilamati na paridevati, na urattalim kandati, na sammoham apajjati.
an4.184:8.6: Ayampi kho, brahmana, maranadhammo samano na bhayati, na santasam apajjati maranassa.
an4.184:9.1: Puna caparam, brahmana, idhekacco akatapapo hoti akataluddo akatakibbiso katakalyano katakusalo katabhiruttano.
an4.184:9.3: Tassa annatarena galhena rogatankena phutthassa evam hoti:
an4.184:9.4: ‘akatam vata me papam, akatam luddam, akatam kibbisam;
an4.184:9.5: katam kalyanam, katam kusalam, katam bhiruttanam.
an4.184:9.6: Yavata, bho, akatapapanam akataluddanam akatakibbisanam katakalyananam katakusalanam katabhiruttananam gati tam gatim pecca gacchami’ti.
an4.184:9.7: So na socati na kilamati na paridevati, na urattalim kandati, na sammoham apajjati.
an4.184:9.8: Ayampi kho, brahmana, maranadhammo samano na bhayati, na santasam apajjati maranassa.
an4.184:10.1: Puna caparam, brahmana, idhekacco akankhi hoti avicikicchi nitthangato saddhamme.
an4.184:10.3: Tassa annatarena galhena rogatankena phutthassa evam hoti:
an4.184:10.5: So na socati na kilamati na paridevati, na urattalim kandati, na sammoham apajjati.
an4.184:10.6: Ayampi kho, brahmana, maranadhammo samano na bhayati, na santasam apajjati maranassa.
an4.184:10.7: Ime kho, brahmana, cattaro maranadhamma samana na bhayanti, na santasam apajjanti maranassa”ti.
an4.184:11.1: “Abhikkantam, bho gotama, abhikkantam, bho gotama …pe… upasakam mam bhavam gotamo dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
